gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.render

Interface ISGR

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SGR, SGRCubemap, SGRFov, SGRStereoscopic

    public interface ISGR
extends com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Interface that must be extended by all types of scene graph renderers
    Author:
    tsagrista

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(SceneGraphRenderer sgr,
            ICamera camera,
            float t,
            int rw,
            int rh,
            com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.FrameBuffer fb,
            IPostProcessor.PostProcessBean ppb)
        Renders the scene
        Parameters:
        sgr - The scene graph renderer object
        camera - The camera.
        t - The time in seconds since the start
        rw - The width
        rh - The height
        fb - The frame buffer, if any
        ppb - The post processing bean

        Parameters:

        h - New height
